price: 9. Mpe tozali kokitisa mayi mapamboama kowuta na likolo, mpe tobotisi na yango bilanga na ba mbuma oyo bazali kobuka yango.
arabic: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ
footnotes: 1 Nagh’l: Bótala na suratu Al-Isrâ mokapo: 91. Na suratu Al-Kahf: 32.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wanazzalnā mina al-samāi māan mubārakan fa-anbatnā bihi jannātin waḥabba al-ḥaṣīdi
